description: TEHRAN – In a statement laden with ambiguity, U.S. President Donald Trump has suggested the possibility of a military strike against Iran's nuclear facilities, stating, "I may do it, I may not, nobody knows."
title: 'I may do it, I may not:' Trump issues ambiguous threat to Iran following Leader's stern warning

description: TEHRAN – Iran has launched a barrage of missiles into the occupied territories as part of the latest phase of Operation True Promise III–this time sending missiles that sport a higher range and power in comparison to the ones that were used before in the course of last five days of conflict with Israel.
title: New type of Iranian missiles, previously undisclosed, reach occupied territories

description: TEHRAN – The Palestinian resistance forces in Gaza have significantly escalated their operations against invading Israeli forces.
title: Resistance sharply increases operations

description: TEHRAN - It took me a moment to understand the sounds that jolted me awake early Friday morning. The windows were rattling, and my first thought was an earthquake. Or maybe an accident at the construction site next door. Israeli attacks on residential buildings in Tehran were the furthest thing from my mind in those initial, disoriented minutes.
title: What Israel wanted with attacks on Iran - what it lost and gained

description: Tucker Carlson put Sen. Ted Cruz on the hot seat during a fiery grilling over the senator’s knowledge of some key facts about Iran.
title: Tucker Carlson attacks Ted Cruz in heated interview over senator’s apparent lack of Iran knowledge

description: BEIRUT — In condemnation of the Zionist regime’s aggression against Iran, and in solidarity with its people, armed forces, and leaders, the “Civil Campaign to Support Palestine and the Issues of the Nation” held its weekly meeting at the Iranian embassy in Beirut.
title: Broad Lebanese solidarity with Iran against the US-led Israeli aggression

description: TEHRAN – Iranian volleyball player Amir Mohammad Golzadeh joined Italian club Yuasa Battery Grottazzolina.
title: Golzadeh joins Yuasa Battery Grottazzolina

description: TEHRAN – Hosts Bahrain, Pakistan and Korea opened their campaigns with impressive victories on Wednesday as the inaugural AVC Men’s Nations Cup Bahrain 2025 got underway at Isa bin Rashid Hall, launching the eight-day competition with three action-packed encounters.
title: Bahrain, Pakistan and Korea claim opening victories at AVC Men’s Nations Cup

description: Pep Guardiola and Manchester City have decided upon their new club captain ahead of the 2025/26 season, following the departure of Kevin De Bruyne to Napoli.
title: Manchester City announce new club captain for 2025/26 season

description: TEHRAN – Iranian skate athlete Matin Safaeian was killed in Israeli attack.
title: Skate athlete Safaeian killed in Israeli attack

description: TEHRAN – Former Persepolis and Esteghlal goalkeeper Mohammad Mohammadi has been appointed as Foolad football club general manager.
title: Mohammad Mohammadi appointed Foolad general manager

description: TEHRAN – Saber Akbari, Iranian handball player, was martyred in Israeli attack.
title: Handball player Akbari martyred in Israeli attack

description: TEHRAN- The Group of Seven (G7), in their recent summit in Canada, once again laid bare the glaring double standards that underpin Western foreign policy, particularly in the volatile Middle East region.
title: G7 tacitly backs Israel as aggressor

description: TEHRAN — Prominent Iranian academic and political figure Zahra Rahnavard has strongly condemned recent Israeli military strikes on Iran, accusing Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of violating international norms and targeting civilians, infrastructure, and scientists.
title: Netanyahu is notorious for killing women and children, Zahra Rahnavard says

description: TEHRAN- The Israeli Stock Exchange's TA-125 index has deviated from its long-term average and variance to an unprecedented extent, showing clear signs of the formation of a politically-backed price bubble.
title: From mirage to reality: Bubble growth of Tel Aviv Stock Exchange index with political backing

description: TEHRAN – Arab tribes in Khorramshahr have joined security and military forces to bolster the safety and stability of this strategically sensitive oil-rich region, situated in southwest Iran.
title: Arab tribes of Khorramshahr help forces amid ongoing Iran-Israel conflict

description: TEHRAN – A new mural at Vanak Square in Tehran was unveiled on Tuesday, depicting the legendary Iranian character “Arash the Archer” (Arash-e Kamangir in Persian) ready to shoot his arrow, with missiles launched in the background, and a verse about Iran.
title: Legendary Iranian character “Arash the Archer” depicted on new mural in Tehran
Leader Speaks to People

description: TEHRAN— The unity of Iranian people is like a thorn in the eyes of the ill-wishers and enemies of this land, said Fatemeh Vaez-Javadi, a faculty member of Tehran University.
title: Solidarity of Iranian people, a thorn in eye of ill-wishers

description: TEHRAN—Deputy head of Iranian police's counterterrorism unit, known as FARAJA, said that success in adversities and overcoming the crisis and war is tied to powerful and smart resilience.
title: Brigadier General: Success in face of adversity tied to strong resilience

description: TEHRAN- In the wake of the heinous aggression by the Zionist regime against the territory of the Islamic Republic of Iran, a campaign titled "Defense of Homeland" has been initiated among media professionals.
title: Iranian media campaign "Defense of Homeland" launched in response to Israeli aggression

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s Institute for Intellectual Development of Children and Young Adults – Kanoon has announced the launch of a craft campaign titled "Gift of the Good Ones," aimed at promoting and deepening the culture of Ashura among its audience.
title: Creative effort launched to promote Ashura culture through handmade crafts

description: TEHRAN—The second round of Iranian University Entrance Exam, simply known as Konkur, was postponed, The National Education Assessment Organization announced.
title: Second round of Konkur postponed

description: TEHRAN—Tabassom Pak, 45, was returning from work to her home near Sabounchi Street in Tehran on Sunday, June 15, to hug her 17-year-old daughter and tell her not to be afraid of the sound of war when she was martyred in her car.
title: 45-year-old mother martyred in one step hugging her daughter

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Parliament condemned recent Israeli attacks on Iranian soil and civilians, warning that a “severe and calculated response” awaits the regime in Tel Aviv—one that would serve as a “lesson in history.”
title: Parliament warns of historic retaliation following Israeli strikes on Iran

description: TEHRAN – The Department of Environment has strongly condemned the recent Israeli attacks on fossil fuel tanks and storage facilities, saying it will be destructive to the natural environment and biodiversity.
title: Iran denounces Israeli attacks as ‘destructive to environment, biodiversity’

description: TEHRAN - The Islamic Revolution Guards Corps has said in a statement that the 11th wave of the retaliatory strikes on Israel included the first generation of Fattah hypersonic missiles, which have “shattered the myth of invincibility of the Zionist regime’s air defense systems”.
title: IRGC says Fattah missiles shattered myth of Zionist regime’s air defense invincibility

description: TEHRAN – The Pentagon has removed Colonel Nathan McCormack from his sensitive advisory role after his scathing criticism of the Israeli regime, including labeling it a "death cult" and questioning if the United States acts as its proxy.
title: Pentagon official axed after calling Israel 'death cult,' highlighting growing US dissent

description: TEHRAN - Asian Gymnastics Union mourns the loss of Tara Hajimiri, an 8-year-old Iranian gymnast whose life was tragically taken in the recent conflict.
title: Asian Gymnastics Union mourns loss of Iranian gymnast Hajimiri

description: TEHRAN - The head of Iran’s Atomic Energy Organization says the country's nuclear facilities remain secure and fully operational, as international scrutiny intensifies following recent Israeli attacks on Iranian territory.
title: Iran’s nuclear facilities operating normally, says Atomic Chief

description: TEHRAN – Iran beat at the 2025 World Aquatics Men's U20 Water Polo Championships on Monday.
title: Iran fall short against Germany at 2025 World Aquatics U20 Water Polo C’ships

description: TEHRAN – In a Wednesday message, Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei warned Washington against involvement in the ongoing Iran-Israel war, threatening severe consequences.
title: 'Any US military intervention will be met with irreparable harm': Leader

description: TEHRAN – Health Minister Mohammad-Reza Zafarqandi has called on the Secretary General of the United Nations, Antonio Guterres, and the World Health Organization’s director for the Eastern Mediterranean Regional Office, Hanan Hassan Balkhi, to censure Israeli airstrikes on Iran, and take action to stop the aggression.
title: Health minister urges UN, WHO to slam, halt Israel’s aggression

description: TEHRAN— Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian emphasized the importance of national cohesion and public engagement during a cabinet session held on Tuesday, saying that with unity and solidarity, the country can overcome any crisis.
title: President Pezeshkian stresses national unity as key to overcoming any crise

description: TEHRAN – In an artistic response to recent Israeli strikes on Iran, renowned Iranian artist Hassan Ruholamin has unveiled a new artwork symbolizing the enduring spirit and resilience of Islamic fighters.
title: Iranian artist Hassan Ruholamin unveils artwork symbolizing resistance
Iran Downs Israeli Hermes Drone
Iranian Missiles Launched

description: TEHRAN – Protesters from different countries gathered in front of the UN's Geneva office on Tuesday to show solidarity with the Iranian people and to strongly denounce Israel's attacks on the country.
title: In front of Geneva’s UN office: people condemn Israeli attacks on Iran

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Free Zones High Council announced that the trade balance of Qeshm Free Trade Zone, in the southern Qeshm Island, was $37.8 million positive in the first two months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21-May 21).
title: Trade balance in Qeshm FTZ hits $37.8m in 2 months

description: TEHRAN - The value of non-oil trade between Iran and China stood at $4.631 billion during the first two months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21-May 21), according to the head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA).
title: Iran-China 2-month non-oil trade stands at $4.631b

description: TEHRAN – Senior CNN journalist Christian Amanpour has forced IAEA director general Rafael Grossi to openly admit that the international body under his leadership has no evidence to prove that Iran is making systematic efforts to build nuclear weapons.
title: Grossi admits no evidence Iran seeking nuclear arms: CNN senior journalist

description: TEHRAN – Hundreds of Israelis have been relocated to different locations, the Israeli newspaper Maariv wrote.
title: Hundreds of Israelis have been moved to different locations: Maariv

description: TEHRAN – An Israeli drone has been downed near the city of Varamin, about 35 kilometers in southeast of Tehran, the Varamin governor announced on Wednesday morning.
title: Iran downs Israeli drone near Tehran

description: TEHRAN – An Israeli F-35 fighter jet has been downed near the city of Varamin, about 35 kilometers in southeast of Tehran, the Varamin governor announced on Wednesday morning.
title: Iran downs Israeli F-35 fighter jet near Tehran
